item.title: Blog Post
item.description: Pandas is a Python package that provides fast, flexible, and … It is well suited for different data types including tabular, ordered and unordered series, arbitrary matrix data, and other statistical data sets. Pandas acts almost as an equivalent to R’s dplyr. - When pulling dataframes, pandas nicely shows the first and last five observations. Link to project 1 Link to google 1+1 ## [1] 2 library(reticulate) py_config() ## python: /stor/home/nnr384/.
